title: New: Le Pie – Secrets
body: Grunge is definitely making a comeback, even if it’s cloaked with a far more pop orientated exterior. In the UK, Wolf Alice and Black Honey are leading the charge, whilst raw-dance duo K.I.D. are making inroads overseas, so it only makes sense that Australia enter the equation, with **Le Pie’s** debut single proving a worthwhile listen. So it’s essentially a pop song, wrapped up with reverb heavy guitars, and a sense of Lana Del Rey inspired 60’s Americana, yet it’s addictive and a more than promising first effort. Check out Secrets below, lifted from a forthcoming EP, _‘and he said, honey you look so fine’_. [Bandcamp](http://lepie.bandcamp.com/releases) / [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/le-pie) Secrets by Le Pie
